attributes.action: MPs and their families of eligible age be conscripted first before anyone else
attributes.additional_details: To concentrate the minds of those in authority, of the magnitude and the consequences of voting for the imposition of military conscription.
attributes.background: Make it a condition of mandating or parliamentary voting on conscription, that all MPs of eligible age, and their children and families of eligible age, are conscripted first, and sent to the war zone, with evidence to prove this, before anyone else is conscripted.

rejection.details: The Government has not announced any plans to introduce conscription.
